Name: Larry The Unlucky Part 2
About the game: Larry is back! If you enjoyed the first game, you will absolutely adore this one! He is not just a little boy anymore, he is a grown man and it seems that love found her place in his heart. But will the unluckiness let him marry the girl of his dreams? Features: Point and click escape room game Play to unravel an intriguing story Find hidden objects and solve different puzzles to progress Supporting 4 different languages
